short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks videos in the Twitter/X feed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Smart Solution for Twitter Video Control

Are you tired of unexpected video playbacks on Twitter that can lead to awkward moments in public or consume your data plan without warning? Look no further, as XBlocker is here to provide you with the control and convenience you need.

Key Features of XBlocker:

Video Blocking: XBlocker allows you to block Video appearence, giving you the power to control your Twitter experience.

Privacy and Discretion: Never be caught off guard by an inappropriate video again. XBlocker ensures that your Twitter feed remains safe and suitable for any environment.

Data Saving: With XBlocker, you can save on your mobile data usage by preventing videos from auto-playing, ensuring that you only watch what you want to.

User-Friendly Interface: Designed with simplicity in mind, XBlocker is easy to use, allowing you to manage your video settings with just a few taps.
